title: A Short film on solar energy
creator_credit: Wild Wood Enterprises, Warner Communications, Saul Bass, Michael Britton and Elaine Bass
brief_description: A lighthearted film which uses animation to trace man’s use of energy through history to the oil shortage crises of the present, and the solutions solar power can offer. From the series “Consumer action now”.
